author: tvolkert
msg: Updated build file to force XSLT generation even if target files are newer than source files (the stylesheet itself may have been changed), and to eliminate deploy targets dependency on the "clean" target (it's easy to run 'ant clean deploy' if this is the behavior you want)

author: yanz
msg: PIG-653  Pig Projection Push Down (Gaurav Jain via yanz)

author: elecharny
msg: Added some extra tests for the load( SchemaName... ) method, with corner cases and error cases

author: elecharny
msg: Fixed a NPE when trying to load a bad schema (schema that does not exist)

author: markt
msg: Import a a package renamed Jakarta BCEL trunk to do the annotation scanning. There is a lot of fat still to be trimmed.
This was done as an svn copy so future updates should be simple via svn merge.
